title: Olivia Attwood flashes her engagement ring as she loving gazes at fiancé Bradley Dack
text:
They announced their engagement earlier this week.

And Olivia Attwood and her new fiancé Bradley Dack looked utterly smitten as they visited a pumpkin farm in Surrey on Wednesday.

The TOWIE star, 28, proudly showed off her huge diamond sparkler, just days after Bradley, 25, proposed during their romantic Dubai break.

Newly-engaged: Olivia Attwood and her new fiancé Bradley Dack looked utterly smitten as they visited a pumpkin farm in Surrey on Wednesday

Olivia cut a casual figure for the outing, so as to ensure all eyes were on her engagement ring.

Dazzling display: The TOWIE star, 28, proudly showed off her huge diamond sparkler

The reality star wrapped up in a black hoodie, which she teamed with long tailored grey pea coat and leggings.

Olivia opted for comfort on her feet with white trainers and fuelled up for the day with a coffee.

Bradley, meanwhile, rocked a black Balenciaga hoodie and skinny jeans.

The couple appeared more loved-up than ever as they headed to the farm arm-in-arm.

Besotted: The couple appeared more loved-up than ever as they headed to the farm arm-in-arm

Olivia - who has been in an on/off relationship with the footballer for four years - shared sweet Instagram snaps of the pair kissing along the beach in Dubai on Sunday evening following the romantic proposal.

Flashing her sparkling pear ring in the images, the star joked the sportsman 'must be crazy' as she and her new fiancé posed on the sandy shores of the holiday hotspot.

The 2017 Love Island contestant - who recently underwent a £2,500 jawline, chin lipo and contouring procedure - captioned the photos: 'He must be crazy... Here’s to forever . I love you BD.'

Casually-clad: Olivia cut a casual figure for the outing, so as to ensure all eyes were on her engagement ring

Olivia and the Blackburn Rovers midfielder first embarked on a relationship in 2015, but broke up when she appeared on Love Island two years later - where she dated co-star Chris Hughes.

After the breakdown of her seven-month romance with reality star Chris, 26, the blonde beauty went on the search for love as she appeared on 2018's Celebs Go Dating.

Despite flirting up a storm with Diversity's Sam Craske on the E4 show, Olivia rekindled things with hunky Bradley in December last year.

'He must be crazy': Olivia announced her engagement to Bradley on Instagram on Sunday evening, following a four-year on/off relationship

How sweet: The 2017 Love Island contestant captioned the photos: 'He must be crazy... Here’s to forever. I love you BD' followed by a diamond emoji

The former grid girl's engagement may come as a surprise to fans as she recently admitted she can't trust Bradley '100%', and even split in April for just under 24 hours.

Olivia told new! magazine last month: 'We row about little things, like house-related things. I'm very OCD and he's very messy.

'I've also got a long way to go with trust. That's my own issue more than his. I don't think you should trust any man 100 per cent.'

Despite her recent comments, the media personality insisted her romance with the Greenwich native is 'more serious than ever' and admitted she's 'old-fashioned' when it comes to marriage in an exclusive interview with MailOnline.
description: The TOWIE star, 28, proudly showed off her huge diamond sparkler on a visit to a pumpkin patch with her fiancé Bradley Dack on Wednesday.
